rules.description: RIGHT_SHIFT + awsd(movement) + r(scrollup) + v (scrolldown) + f(button1) + g(button2)
CAPS LOCK + HJKL to arrow keys
CAPS LOCK + F to Fn key
CAPS LOCK + D to ALT key
CAPS LOCK + QUOTE to DELETE_OR_BACKSPACE key
CAPS LOCK + V -> Open Visual Studio Code
CAPS LOCK + B -> Open Browser (Google Chrome)
CAPS LOCK + E -> Open Eclipse/Android Studio
CAPS LOCK + R to LEFT CONTROL + S (for Resizing window)
CAPS LOCK + I/O to PREV/NEXT Tabs
CAPS LOCK + Up/Down/Left/Right to Scroll Up/Down/Left/Right
TILDE: Double Tap -> ESCAPE, Single Tap -> TILDE
Double RIGHT SHIFT to toggle CAPSLOCK
